document.full_text: french drugmaker sanofi aventis said on tuesday it had won u.s. approval to market its fluzone intradermal vaccine for adults, allowing for flu injections with a very fine needle.
document.title: sanofi wins u.s. ok for short needle flu vaccine
lines_and_colors: french drugmaker sanofi aventis said on tuesday it had won u.s. approval to market its fluzone intradermal vaccine for adults, allowing for flu injections with a very fine needle.
